title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The line of code in org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil has Class.forName("org...BidiUtil") which causes a NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT. This error is not defined in the CLDC class libraries and leads to a problem in the CLDC version of SWT. The issue is not caught by the eclipse compiler or Sun's compiler.
EB: The reflection usage in BidiUtil needs to be removed to avoid the NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT.
SR: To reproduce the issue, compile and run the CLDC version of SWT using class libraries that do not define NoClassDefFoundError. Verify or use jxeLink or a similar tool to see the problem manifest.
